MY WORKING PROFILES

MERN | FULL STACK DEVELOPER

With the popularity of React flying high especially with its new hooks feature, I have been involved in several MERN stack as well as Full stack projects. All of these projects was done by taking in consideration of code optimization and code reusability. Some components based apps are also built by using context API and Redux, so that app performs better even on larger scale.

WEB DESIGNER

I have designed various attractive and eye-catching web pages and boilerplates that can help and accompanies in development of other web apps easily and faster. These webs apps are mostly designed and styled with JavaScript, CSS along with Saas and HTML. UI are designed with several animations, transition and transform properties that makes UI cool looking and responsive.

MOBILE APP DEVELOPER

I had built some native apps on android studio with Java as a programming languages. As a Major project in android, I've developed an Bill Splitter and Messaging App which can be used to share the expenses with friends, roomates or business partner. This app can also be used as a messaging and chatting with each other.
